name: Cecil's Adventures
description:
Game Controls
A - move left
D - move right
Space - jump
Enter - use weapon
Q - switch weapon

So what's this game about, anyway?

Cecil's Adventures is inspired by the Youtube channel "Cecil Says - Is Adult Content".  If you're not familiar with him, a lot of this game may go over your head, so be sure to check him out at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_BA4i8-FiDx03c6BghMkIw

Music Credits

"The Descent"
"Anxiety"
"Aftermath"
"Water Prelude" 

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
